item.description:
Learn about mushrooms and other edible fungi!

We'll be joining a Mass-based group for mushroom identification and foraging at a natural area near Ipswich, Mass.

Fungus identification is a fascinating subject. Learning about mushrooms in a group like this is the quickest and safest way.

 

~Group size is very limited.

~Bring a wicker basket if you have one or some paper bags.

Though I have identified and picked mushrooms and other fungi in the past, please note that I claim no expertise on this subject!

Carpool: 9 am @ Portsmouth C&J Bus/Park & Ride - Grafton Ave. Meet at the back of the lot.

 

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup.

Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment. Consumption of wild fungi is at your own risk. I claim no particular expertise regarding mushroom identification.

*Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: Mushroom Hunting!
